From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::War Machine::

War Machine moved away from the lasers. He also avoided the direct hit
of the missiles, but the explosian sent him to the ground with a thud.
"Prepare for extermination!" He grabbed his gun, shooting two missiles,
and a berage of rapid fire plasma charges, at Mobster.

OOC: Thanks for the correct spelling of Kung Fu, Soulstice.
